CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Four bridging dithiophene units with the atoms of carbon ( C ) , silicon ( Si ) , germanium ( Ge ) and nitrogen ( N ) afford cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene ( CPDT ) , dithienosilole ( DTS ) , dithienogermole ( DTG ) and dithieno [ 3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole ( DTP ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene (CPDT) |
| dithienosilole (DTS) |
| dithienogermole (DTG) |
| dithieno [3,2-b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene (CPDT) |
| dithienosilole (DTS) |
| dithienogermole (DTG) |
| dithieno [3,2-b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP) |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names, as they are clearly described as specific chemical compounds.
